attributes.action: give to the people of Britain the same privileges that are extended to the Royal Family, in that we can decide who is our Prime Minister. Not through Royal consent, but by democratic election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I consider the current means of electing our government is not democratic. The Queen has the Royal prerogative to appoint Her head of state, irrespective of the wishes of the people. Under our supposed democratic system, a government can be and usually is elected by a minority of the electorate. I ask my vote be considered individually, as opposed to a block vote that might elect my chosen representative but may not elect my choice of government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
